name: Evil Plush Toy Horror
description:
Evil Plush Toy Horror is an atmospheric horror in which the main focus is on research, solving puzzles, and the most important goal is to survive!

Events are developing in two locations. The game starts with a shopping mall, something suddenly happens in it and you have to figure out what happened and get out of here alive. But all the passages are locked. A teddy bear will help you with this. To do this, he will ask you to fulfill his request…

You are being chased by a scary plush toy, so you need to hide and not catch the eye of this monster.

After getting out of the supermarket, you will go to the factory where it all started... There was an accident and now the place is abandoned. It is important not to get caught by the evil toy in the eye. In the game you will find a lot of scary and atmospheric moments. But the main question remains: can you escape from the monster?
